duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish company flight operations policies, processes, and procedures with an emphasis on safety, security, and quality.
Ensure all flight operations are in compliance with FAA and DOT requirements.
Maintain competent and adequate staffing of crew, dispatch, and administrative functions.
Develop and manage company budgets for flight operations.
Maintain a favorable working relationship with the FAA and other relevant departments.

education_certification.credential: Must hold Airline Transport Pilot certificate. Bachelor’s Degree in Aviation, Business, or related field preferred, but not required.
